sentences.en: A coral reef is built by the accretion of tiny, identical organisms.
sentences.cn: 珊瑚礁是由许多相同的微生物不断堆积而成。

sentences.en: A glacier is formed by the accretion of many particles of frozen packed snow.
sentences.cn: 冰川是由许多冻实的小雪块相加而形成的.

sentences.en: Altai orogeny , as one of notable crustal accretion areas, is famous for its abundant mineral deposits.
sentences.cn: 阿尔泰造山带是中亚地区显生宙大陆地壳增生明显的地区之一, 蕴藏丰富的矿产资源.

sentences.en: An accretion disk with vertical structure is studied by using a new anomalous viscosity.
sentences.cn: 利用一种全新的反常粘滞,主要研究了具有垂向结构的吸积盘.

sentences.en: Chinese olive ( Canarium Album ) tend as the accretion of density likely distributing equably.
sentences.cn: 橄榄 ( Canariumalbum ) 有可能随着密度的增大而趋于均匀分布.

sentences.en: It is well known that accretion disks are hydrodynamic disks with anomalous viscosity.
sentences.cn: 天体物理吸积盘是具有反常粘滞的流体盘.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, astrophysicists have persisted in their belief that accretion disks are indeed turbulent.
sentences.cn: 虽然如此, 天文物理学家仍旧坚持信念,认为吸积盘的确是充满乱流扰动的.

sentences.en: So it retains the original natural nourish ingredients, no chemical accretion . It is safe to enjoy.
sentences.cn: 保留原有天然营养成份, 不加任何化学添加剂, 使用安全.

sentences.en: The accretion phenomenon was firstly discussed by Kelvin et al. on the 19 th.
sentences.cn: 十九世纪末,开尔文(Kelvin)等人首先讨论了吸积现象.

sentences.en: The multiple migration - accretion concept of Gruner deserves mention.
sentences.cn: 格鲁纳的多次迁移 ― ―增长说受到了重视.

sentences.en: The planetesimals accretions of the Earth obviously have two stages, including initial accretion and late accretion.
sentences.cn: 这种不均一性起源于前地球阶段堆积星子的不均一性.

sentences.en: The script has been gathering editorial accretions for years.
sentences.cn: 该剧本经历了多年的修改加工。

sentences.en: The Thick Accretion Disk Model and Self - gravitating Accretion Disk Model of QSOs.
sentences.cn: 类星体的厚吸积盘与自引力吸积盘模型.

sentences.en: There are two main theories concerning massive star formation accretion and merger.
sentences.cn: 文章简要叙述了有关大质量恒星形成的理论以及相关观测证据.

sentences.en: There is a gradual accretion in lumbar segments from top to down.
sentences.cn: 腰椎节段椎弓根螺钉的拔出力从上到下,逐渐增大,轴向刚度亦然.

sentences.en: This formation, called an accretion disk, may be very important in some stellar birth sequences.
sentences.cn: 这种构成物即所谓吸积盘, 它在恒星诞生的某些阶段可能是非常重要的.

words.tran_cn: 使依附；使连接；把…吸引过来
添加；增加物；连生；冲积层

trans.tran_cn: 堆积，<植>连生，添加生长，<天>吸积
trans.tran_en: a gradual process by which new things are added and something gradually changes or gets bigger
